properties.name: rpc.server.address
properties.description: The service provider address, default is {@link InetAddress#getHostAddress()}.

properties.name: rpc.server.app-name
properties.description: Application name, which defaults to provider-1

properties.name: rpc.server.port
properties.description: The service startup port is 8080 by default

properties.name: rpc.server.registry
properties.description: Registration center, such as zookeeper and nacos, defaults to zookeeper

properties.name: rpc.server.registry-addr
properties.description: The address of the registry is 127.0.0.1:2181 by default

properties.name: rpc.server.transport
properties.description: Transmission protocols, such as netty, http or socket etc..., are netty by default
